summary: Provides a command‑line utility to fine‑tune a Stable Diffusion model with custom concepts using the Diffusers library. It defines datasets for loading images and prompts, parses training options, prepares the model and optimizer, runs the diffusion training loop with optional attention‑processor customisation, and saves the resulting model and metadata.
business_intent: Enable developers and creators to train personalized image generation models on proprietary data, supporting custom brand, style, or concept generation for commercial or creative use cases.
